title: Innovating Social Education with Open Educational Resources (OER)

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental digital device utilization skills and educational resource literacy
context.additional_context: Asynchronous learning in smartphone-centric limited-technology environments, emphasizing exploration of OER's social significance and utilization strategies

learning_goals: Learners can critically analyze and explain the concept of OER and its social impact
Learners can identify three or more challenges that arise when designing education using OER
Learners can practice evaluating OER resources in smartphone-based environments and applying them to learning activities
Learners can discuss how OER contributes to bridging the gap between formal and informal education
Learners can improve OER utilization strategies based on formative assessment feedback

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
